translations: 欺骗；使着迷；轻松地消磨

sentences.sentence: He used his newspapers to beguile the readers into buying shares in his company.
sentences.translation: 他利用他的报纸诱导读者购买他公司的股票。

sentences.sentence: Pleasure him with sports, beguile him in wholesome ways, so that his health come again.
sentences.translation: 让他在运动中获得快乐，用有益健康的方式诱导他，这样他就恢复健康了。

sentences.sentence: Tis not much, your Majesty, yet perchance it may beguile a short half-hour for want of a better.
sentences.translation: 不多，陛下，不过，也许因为找不到更好的话题，就花短短的半个钟头讲讲。
